name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close Browser - Schedule the Shutdown of Your Tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes Google Chrome after a configurable amount of time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Close Browser - Schedule the Shutdown of Your Tabs is a Chrome extension that allows you to set a timer to automatically close all Google Chrome windows/tabs after a specified amount of time. Perfect for managing your browsing time and saving energy or when you fall asleep in front of your PC

Features:

- Set a timer in hours, minutes, and seconds.
- Simple and intuitive user interface.
- Easy-to-use start and stop button.
- Button changes color to indicate the state (green to start, red to stop).

Please note that the extension requires permissions to close browser windows.

# Changelog

## Version 2.0
- New Logo
- Core timer functionality with hours, minutes, seconds input
- Visual feedback with color-changing button and container
- Animated extension icon during countdown
- Automatic browser shutdown when timer expires
- Ability to stop timer before completion
- State persistence between browser sessions

Keywords: "automatic closure, timer, time management, energy saving, browsing, tabs, shutdown, close tabs"
